name: Notice Period
description:
CULT BALM NOTICE PERIOD

George Foreman's last day at a company where he served his life's 25 years, is inching closer. However, HR reveals a certain clause that talks about an extended notice period of 30 days to which Foreman strongly disagrees. After that, things start taking a surreal turn for him as the whole office starts becoming a riddle itself to be solved.

Play as George Foreman and try to escape the weird premises and people. Try to reach your home on time!! 

NOTE

It runs only on PC browsers!

Avoid clicking on the screen with mouse while the game is on as the camera can go bonkers!

If camera goes bonkers, please refresh the page to resume the play!

CONTROLS

Use <^> (Arrow Keys) to navigate and interact.

Made with Bitsy 3D by aloelazoe Follow CULT BALM Poster Artwork by Sheena Ankshie Audio Production by LAX HEAD
